clinical_study.brief_title: Trip HF Study: Triple Resynchronization in Paced Heeart Failure Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Triple Resynchronization in Paced Heart Failure Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the feasibility of permanent biventricular pacing using three ventricular leads, and its efficacy in terms of inter and intra-ventricular resynchronization, in patients with congestive heart failure and a non-functional atrium (chronic AF).
